gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 115, Jazz 105
gameRecap.excerpt: Luka Doncic put up 29 points, 12 rebounds and 13 assists for the Mavericks as they defeated the Jazz, 115-105. Doncic recorded his 19th triple-double of the season, and 75th of his career. Kyrie Irving added 27 points, five assists and four 3PM for the Mavericks in the victory, while Lauri Markkanen knocked down his 1,000th career three-pointer as he tallied 34 points (6-9 3pt. FG) and seven rebounds for the Jazz in the losing effort. The Mavericks win their fourth game in a row as they improve to 42-29 on the season, while the Jazz fall to 29-43.
